casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Wayne Thomas JOHNSON. No. 119P00-8. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of July 2005 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review" under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
